timeline.message: :art: remove deprecated warnings for Object.newInstance, HelpCtx(Class), FileUtil.preventFileChooserSymlinkTraversal, InputEvent.CTRL_MASK, InputEvent.SHIFT_MASK and Hashing.md5
:art: fixed a couple of critical issues (according to sonarqube)
:art: upgraded MD5 hases to SHA256 hashes
